name: Formations!
description:
Formations! is a tactical roguelite where you have to balance defending your bases with attacking the enemy. Use your intuition, abilities, and luck to survive 12 waves of enemy attacks. The enemy gets stronger with each wave.

Controls

Move Player/Use Abilities/Navigate MenusArrow KeysPlace Allies/Make SelectionsZ KeyPause Game/Back Out of MenusEscape Key
